complete.exploreDashboardDesc: Get started with time tracking and absence management
complete.inviteTeamDesc: Add colleagues to collaborate and manage time together
complete.subtitle: Your account is ready to use. Welcome to the team!
complete.summaryDesc: Here's a summary of your configuration.
complete.title: You're all set!

holidaySetup.cardDesc: Choose your country to import public holidays. You can customize holidays later in settings.
holidaySetup.countryDesc: Public holidays will be imported based on your selection.
holidaySetup.presetNameDesc: A name to identify this holiday preset.
holidaySetup.setAsDefaultDesc: Apply this holiday preset to all employees.
holidaySetup.subtitle: Select your country to import public holidays. This helps track time off accurately.
holidaySetup.title: Set up holidays

notifications.preferencesDesc: Choose which notifications you want to receive.
notifications.pushDesc: Receive instant updates even when you're not using the app.
notifications.pushNotSupported: Push notifications are not supported in this browser
notifications.statusUpdatesDesc: When your requests are approved or rejected.
notifications.subtitle: Choose how you want to receive updates about approvals, status changes, and team activities.
notifications.teamChangesDesc: When team members are added or removed.
notifications.title: Set up notifications

organization.createDescription: Set up your own organization and invite your team
organization.skipDescription: If your administrator will invite you to an organization, you can skip this step for now.
organization.subtitle: Create your organization to unlock all features, or skip if you're waiting for an invitation.
organization.title: Set up your organization

profile.birthdayDesc: Your team can wish you a happy birthday!
profile.personalInfoDesc: This information will be visible to your team members.
profile.subtitle: Help your team recognize you by adding some personal information.
profile.title: Complete your profile

vacationPolicy.accrualTypeDesc: How vacation days are granted throughout the year.
vacationPolicy.allowCarryoverDesc: Allow unused days to be carried to next year.
vacationPolicy.annualDaysDesc: Number of vacation days per year.
vacationPolicy.cardDesc: Configure vacation allowance for your team. You can customize this later in settings.
vacationPolicy.maxCarryoverDesc: Maximum days that can be carried over.
vacationPolicy.name: Policy Name
vacationPolicy.nameDesc: A name to identify this policy.
vacationPolicy.subtitle: Create a vacation policy for your organization. This determines how many days off employees get.
vacationPolicy.title: Set up vacation policy

features.absencesDesc: Request time off, manage vacation days, and track holidays
features.teamDesc: Work with your team, approve requests, and manage employees
features.timeTrackingDesc: Clock in and out, track work hours, and manage time corrections

welcome.joinedOrganization: You've joined {organization}. Let's complete your profile setup.
welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started with a quick setup. This will only take a few minutes.
welcome.title: Welcome to Z8!

wellness.cardDesc: Enable optional hydration reminders while you work. You can always adjust these settings later.
wellness.enableReminderDesc: Receive gentle reminders to drink water during work hours.
wellness.subtitle: Set up water reminders to stay healthy during your workday. You'll receive gentle notifications to drink water while clocked in.
wellness.title: Stay Hydrated

workSchedule.classificationDesc: How you want to track your working hours.
workSchedule.hoursPerWeekDesc: Typical full-time is 40 hours per week.
workSchedule.scheduleDesc: Set your default working hours. You can adjust this later in settings.
workSchedule.subtitle: Define your working hours to help track time and manage absences accurately.
workSchedule.title: Set your work schedule

workTemplates.cardDesc: Create a default work schedule. You can add more templates later in settings.
workTemplates.error: Failed to create work schedule template
workTemplates.hoursPerWeekDesc: Total working hours per week. Typical full-time is 40 hours.
workTemplates.name: Template Name
workTemplates.nameDesc: A name to identify this work schedule.
workTemplates.setAsDefaultDesc: Apply this schedule to all employees.
workTemplates.subtitle: Set up a work schedule template for your organization. This defines working hours for your team.
workTemplates.title: Create work schedule template
workTemplates.workingDaysDesc: Select which days are working days. Hours will be distributed evenly.
